[e.g., Lao+ 2011] Knowledge base embedding Very efficient Better prediction accuracy

KB Never Ending Language Learning (NELL) Training: version 165 Developing: new facts between v.166 and v.533 Testing: new facts between v.534 and v.745
Data statistics of the training set
Entity Retrieval: One positive entity with 100 negative entities
Relation Retrieval: Positive entity pairs with equal number of negative pairs
Both models finish training in 10 iterations. TRESCAL filters 96% entity triples with
# iterations for TransE is set to 500 (the default value).
Satya Nadella is the CEO of Microsoft.
Raw data: NY Times corpus & Freebase Entities in NY Times and Freebase are aligned
Raw tensor construction 80,698 entities & 1,652 relations Type information from Freebase & NER Type constraints are derived from training data
Task identify FB relations of entity pairs in text 10,000 entity pairs: 2,048 have both entities in FB Evaluation metric Weighted mean average precision (MAP) on 19 relations
Evaluated using only 2,048 FB entity pairs
TRESCAL: A KB embedding model via tensor decomposition Leverages entity type constraint Faster model training time Highly scalable to large KB Higher prediction accuracy
Challenges & Future Work Capture more types of relational domain knowledge Support more sophisticated inferential tasks
